price: ជាការពិតណាស់ នៅក្នុងរឿងរបស់យូសុហ្វនិងបងប្អូនរបស់ គាត់ គឺជាភស្ដុតាងៗសម្រាប់ពួកដែលសួរ ។
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
